mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_light_radius(n, l, lanterns):
    lanterns.sort()
    distances = [lanterns[i + 1] - lanterns[i] for i in range(n - 1)]
    start_distance = lanterns[0]
    end_distance = l + lanterns[-1]
    max_distance_between_lanterns = max(distances) / 2 if distances else 0
    d = max(start_distance, end_distance, max_distance_between_lanterns)
    return d

    end_distance = l * lanterns[-1]
    max_distance_between_lanterns = max(distances) / 2 if distances else 0

    return d
